channel.title: [PI] F'ed up Skills. *UNSOLVED*
channel.description: Alright, I got my combat skills leetproof. But some of my Skills are just fucked up...? Like in my server Config.java I have Mining down to 5. But it still gives me 90 exp? And my woodcutting is set at 5 also, but I get 125 exp per log.....? My firemaking is set at 5 but I get 31.5 exp per log. AND, I can Clip right though anything on the map with firemaking..... Could somebody please tell me how to fix this? (This isn't even the half of it, if you really want to see you can TeamViewer me... Just PM me for info.) __ And while i'm at it, could somebody explain what this means and what it is used for? [code] setBounds(29296, 8, 16, 1, Interface);[/code] You see, I need 29296 to open the quest interface, so I can explain to players how to start the quest...

item.title: [PI] F'ed up Skills. *UNSOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:9, topic:459475”]It’s not fun for the staff when people report each other in the same thread. Get along with each other.

Anyways, I’ve cleaned up the thread. Any other spam will result in consequences.[/quote]Okay sorry but thanks. Now seriously! Can anybody help me with this!!! I went though all firemaking file and few others… Their all how they should be! I DON’T UNDERSTAND THIS!

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

nzxt:

It could be your config.java … That has an over all skill multiplier as well as individual skill multipliers.

Could be to :).

item.title: [PI] F'ed up Skills. *UNSOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“The Moparian, post:2, topic:459475”]You may need to set individual xp rates for specific skills. For example, changing how much xp is granted per log via the woodcutting configuration.[/quote]I’m not sure you completely understand my situation. I will show you tomorrow on TeamViewer.
As if right now, I’ve done literally over 50+ changes or more to my server today. I’m f’n going to bed. Goodnight.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] F'ed up Skills. *UNSOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

Alright, I got my combat skills leetproof. But some of my Skills are just fucked up…? Like in my server Config.java I have Mining down to 5. But it still gives me 90 exp? And my woodcutting is set at 5 also, but I get 125 exp per log…? My firemaking is set at 5 but I get 31.5 exp per log. AND, I can Clip right though anything on the map with firemaking… Could somebody please tell me how to fix this?
(This isn’t even the half of it, if you really want to see you can TeamViewer me… Just PM me for info.)
__
And while i’m at it, could somebody explain what this means and what it is used for?

You see, I need 29296 to open the quest interface, so I can explain to players how to start the quest…

Read full topic
